website_summaries.verdict: One of the best solutions for sun-exposed skin is natural aloe vera, and Amara Organics is a top choice for users who want an organic formula with no artificial additives that doesn't feel too sticky.
pros: Soothes skin after time spent in the sun with its cold-pressed organic aloe vera that doesn't contain any artificial additives
Earns praise for absorbing quickly into the skin
cons: The consistency is somewhat watery, but this doesn't affect its skin-soothing properties
Contains xanthan, a sugar-based thickening agent

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this product two years ago to have on hand for bug bites and sunburns but quickly discovered its many other uses. I have psoriasis and started using it to clam areas of outbreak, especially on my head and face. I now use it daily as a face moisturizer, scalp soother and as a hair gel. We still use it for bug bites and it works immediately. I LOVE this Natural versatile product, I hope you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for some sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get “good” aloe Vera gel, as I typically have just gotten the local drugstore brand, due to availability. Unfortunately after using this on my face every morning for a few days (as I have been with drugstore brand) my face reacted poorly and it took over a week of breakout to recover, so I can’t recommend this for sensitive skin. The store-brand aloe vera is the only thing I’ve been able to use on my face, forever, which hasn’t caused my skin to break out. Sadly this product is like all others I’ve tried, and my face does not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Who

customer_reviews.title: Quailty Product!  Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Aloe Vera Gel for over a Year now. I've tried a few other brands of Aloe Vera and I definitely like this one the best. I apply the gel onto my face right after my shower and right before I add some facial sunblock. And again in the evening. The gel is easy to apply, it has very little scent, no sticky residue, and is a great moisturizer. What makes this product even better is that this company stands behind their products with their top quality customer service. I had a minor issue and it was resolved above my expectations. Their customer service is responsive and friendly. I would highly recommend this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: C Sinsay

customer_reviews.title: It burned like crazy on my face
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT use this on your face if you have Rosacea. It burned like crazy on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not the aloe Vera in stores...
customer_reviews.text: Think of the aloe Vera you grew up with. Green, goopy, sticky, doesn't dry. Sound about right? Now imagine a mod thin clear consistency that is smooth, hydrating, goes on like silk, immediately dries and works much better than anything in the store. I put this on my face, on sunburn on my boyfriend's CYSTIC ACNE... amazing stuff. I get heat rashes on my neck that i use this for. I love this product and this line.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Light and soothing.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I was looking for something to soothe radiation burns (from cancer treatments). Most aloe after-sun products have alcohol which burned worse. This product was light, soothing and helped the skin heal. It worked better than most of the over-the-counter moisturizers that the doctors recommended. I still required a barrier lotion over this to prevent chafing, but I highly recommend this for irritated skin.
customer_reviews.author: LizG

customer_reviews.title: Life changing.
customer_reviews.text: It's working better than Scalpicin (topical steroid), and a many other products I've tried, on pustular psoriasis and whatever is going on on my scalp (guttate psoriasis and/or seb derm). 5 days in now. Much improved. Hope to be fully clear in a week or two, since the larger boils take more time to heal.
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not your drug store aloe!
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't have any extra smells or dyes so it is a little different then drugstore aloe. This can be a little off for people that are used to drug store aloe, I promise it's suppose to smell like that!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is a 5 star product yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is a 5 star product yet. Only started using it 10 days ago & I have seen a significant reduction in the appearance of my sun spots. I will give a update, after a one month trial.
customer_reviews.author: ccphilly

customer_reviews.title: Speeds up healing
customer_reviews.text: Used on my surgery area it helped faster healing. Used for my 4year old and cut closed by end of the day. My new born umbilical cord stump didn’t fall off even after a month, and next thing suggested by pediatrician is to get it surgically removed under anesthesia, and we wished for simpler solution. I ordered a brand new bottle and applied few drops for cord stump twice a day for 3 days, and stump has fallen off, with no surgery needed. I can’t say how thankful I am for this product, my prayers answered.
customer_reviews.author: Sreepallavi Sujinder Family

customer_reviews.title: This Product Is The Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product at the beginning of the 2019 summer to treat mild sunburn and sun+sweat irritated skin. The product exceeded my expectations... even if the gel is a bit 'thin'. I have grown A. vera (taxonomic name for Aleo vera) plants, stripped the skin, and pureed + strained the bulk jelly - and while this process yields is the BEST product - the method is an absolutely royal pain-in-the-butt! Given my own experiences and the usage results during the summer, this produce was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Senior321

customer_reviews.title: Makes dry skin smoother
customer_reviews.text: Using this gel daily it smooths the dry skin more softer and also I'm Using this gel mixed with jojoba oil instead of hair gel and works well and also I'm Using this on my hair before shower and it makes scalp cool . This is best moisturizer in my night time face routine , it repairs the more dry and flaky skin. It has a more liquid texture, I thought it is a gel but it is not and that is only thing I'm disappointed with.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for Skin Care
customer_reviews.text: I love this aloe gel. It is great for providing healing qualities to damaged or dry or itchy skin. It is absorbed quickly and is soothing. A bonus is that my skin looks smoother and toned after use. It is a pure aloe gel, which is what my dermatologist said is strongly preferred compared to other aloe products. It goes a long way, too.
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you want something less goopy
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a thick gel, this isn’t it. The thinner consistency makes it much nicer to use on your face as it doesn’t leave you with a tight goopy feeling like the heavier gel. My husband hates having stuff on his face and can use this no problem. Soothing and moisturizing and all the things you want from aloe with a much less goopy consistency.
customer_reviews.author: mollipop

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Only aloe I'll ever use!! Completely free of any additives and AMAZING on my skin! Been using this for over 6 months and zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie T

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It's a bad gel, well in fact it is not gel... it's liquid... Bad quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a miracle for skin and scalp
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I had decently good skin with the occasional breakout. I have used all sorts of products and even got up to a pretty intense post washing skin regimen which included toner, serum, moisturizer and an oil, but now I use this product in place of a toner and follow with a moisturizer and my skin couldn't be happier! I have had literally zero breakouts, my skin tone is more even, and my pores have all but disappeared. I also have a pretty bad scalp, and this stuff helps calm that down and clear my flakes. The scent isn't that great, but honestly its very mild and goes away as soon as its dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your aloe vera gel feels cool on my skin
customer_reviews.text: My philosophy of skin care has changed. No more harsh chemicals that make unrealistic claims. Want products that are soothing and promote skin health. Your aloe vera gel feels cool on my skin, and, with use contributes to a healthy glow as well.Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for sunburns
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I've never used a better product for after-sun care. If I'm not careful, I'll get a sunburn on those first hot days of summer, then it turns into a tan and I'm good for the rest of the season. With this product, my burn does not last nearly as long, is not as painful, and peeling is minimum. It absorbs quickly into your skin and you don't feel icky like you do with other aloe gels. I've noticed a number of the reviews complain of a fishy smell. To me, it's pretty neutral- it's not really good or bad. And, the bottle lasts a long time. Two (tan!) thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I love that they are a family run company. The aloe dries fast, has a pleasant smell and really helps with pimples. I have hormonal acne at the ripe old age of 37 :( If I feel a pimple coming, I put some of the aloe vera on the area and it helps to stop the pimple from growing out of control. It also helps with razor bumps. A little goes a long way but I will definitely be purchasing again when I run out of product.
customer_reviews.author: mhart318

customer_reviews.title: Great Multipurpose Aloe Juice
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the runnier consistency of this allow gel but it works so much better than typical "sunburn" aloe. I originally bought this to help heal my embarrassing adult acne and it has worked well for that. I have also used it successfully on sunburns, rashes, dry skin and scars. It has helped speed up healing time on my sunburns and makes rashes almost disappear overnight. I especially love that it has few additives unlike drug store products. A win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: A.luebsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: but I like the gentleness
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to my granddaughter and kept one fit me for Christmas.. I’ve only used it a couple times, but I like the gentleness . I have rosacea so I watch for products that increase redness. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Bahni

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great for Acne
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely great for acne. I tried finding a toner to help with my acne scars and uneven skin tone and nothing works as well as this aloe vera. I suffered from cystic acne for years and the acne finally started going away and all that remains are the scars. I have tried everything, even prescription strength medication, but nothing works as well as this aloe vera. I would definitely recommend. Don't expect overnight results, but give it two weeks and you will notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Angjela

customer_reviews.title: I like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. It feels great, gets absorbed instantly. I apply this on my face and my scalp. I sometimes add this to my oil and apply it on my scalp so it acts as a conditioner. But over it feels natural and clean. I like it. And I was actually hoping it to be a little more thicker in texture but it's very light and more like water.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: not for raw, chapped, eczema skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my child who suffers from cold eczema. Her hands get very dry and chapped in the winter, leaving her raw and in pain. The gel may be good for other things, but it didn't help her- and eventually made her skin feel as if it were burning again. I'll keep it and use it for myself, as I don't have as sensitive skin as she does.
customer_reviews.author: jmich

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so when I use the aloe vera gel on my face for a couple of days in a row it tends to dry my skin. It might produce better benefits for someone with oily skin, by not adding moisture but perhaps reducing some of the oil. I prefer to use it as a moisturizer or conditioner on my hair and it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home remedies- I've used it for my daughters itchy scalp, and my son's itchy butt. Anyways it's useful for a slew of things and pretty darn close to cracking open an aloe plant. I recommend this product over any others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. I use this with jojoba oil as a facial moisturizer and my skin has never looked or felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Y.

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates your skin and your hair!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this aloe vera gel. It feel so pure and natural! My face became sensitive after I started using AHAs and BHAs and I use this product after I cleanse my face. Then I follow it with my serums and and moisturizers. It greatly improved my skin texture and it calmed the irritation. It is very refreshing and I highly recommend using this. It's also a great product for men who might not like fragrances or using products on their skin - keep it simple!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Too watery (but then again like I said I don't know how it should feel) ...
customer_reviews.text: My review may not be as helpful, beacuse I honestly don't know how Aloe Vera Gel is supposed to feel because I've never dealt with it I guess you can say. Cons: Too watery (but then again like I said I don't know how it should feel) Pros: Love how the company sent me an email with a list of different ways you can use the Aloe Vera Gel and with what other products & how much. Also they tell you what each ingredient is for. It does feel cool and not warm or anything. Other than that I'm a slacker who hasn't really tried it out, but I'm trying to start.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Faz

customer_reviews.title: Great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: This aloe has been wonderful for treating some skin issues I have been dealing with for quite a while. I use it all over my body and it seems to have a detoxing effect. Will continue purchasing it!
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know if I like it or not
customer_reviews.text: It’s so hard to find a moisturizer for oily skin that’s not too heavy. I find stuff designed for oily skin is kind of drying and makes my skin over compensate by putting out more oil. I thought maybe this stuff would help but I don’t feel like it does much. I’m kind of on the fence about it.
customer_reviews.author: Labuszewski

customer_reviews.title: Good product, natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my skin routine, and have found it does a great job for my adult/ acne prone/ very sensitive skin on its own as a layer or in homemade face sprays. The last time I ordered it, it was a bit more off color, but seems to be ok after using it. The smell is meh (fresh aloe does not smell any better!), if you want it to smell good you may want to mix with some scent. I appreciate there are no perfumes though, for me it leaves less a chance for reaction. Also use it on my kids for healing wounds or, of course, sunburns. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Martini

customer_reviews.title: Liquid gold
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to brand. Its not perfect because of the preservative in it. But its the most natural one i found. Its not thick. Its runny. But it prevents me from looking like a peeling freak show. I was cursed with the red head gene so my skin needs some extra lovin. I dont want to spread chemical jam on me. For me this works well enough. That and a sassy coverup from Free People and im good to go.
customer_reviews.author: The_lulu_garden

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this initially to use on a beach vacation to use as after sun care. Now I use it daily as skin conditioner on my face, chest, hands, arms... all areas that are particularly vulnerable to sun and aging. It's more or less scent free, non sticky, quick drying and feels great. I'm on my second bottle and love it!
customer_reviews.author: reluctant consumer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than gel
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a non-alcohol version of aloe for after radiation. The green stuff I was using was sticky and I didn't like the smell. This is more like a liquid, and has no smell. It is absorbed by the skin instantly and leaves nothing behind on clothes. It is cooling and my go to for the next two months.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Nydegger

customer_reviews.title: Best skin care!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to everyone for basic skin care. I’ve spent that last year or so trying to find something that could clear my skin without drying it out too much or making me break out. My skin is typically on the dryer side, but thicker oils and lotions do not work out. After starting this aloe, I noticed results in just over a week. It’s clearing my skin, but doesn’t dry it out or make it too oily. Red spots are fading, and helps with acne scars! This is something I plan to purchase routinely!
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing healing gel!
customer_reviews.text: This gel is the most amazing stuff I've ever put on a sore. It has healed abraisions, dry skin, cuts, and rashes. It even has even mostly healed my precancerous lip after doctors tried many things to get rid of the sores. I still have a tiny sore that the gel keeps at bay. I saw doctors for three years to try to get a cure, and had the best result with aloe vera. Thank you for this great product. I tell everyone I know to buy some!
customer_reviews.author: Karen H. Black

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and Versatile!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! And useful in so many ways! Last year I completed treatments for breast cancer, and after every radiation treatment, I slathered on this aloe vera gel. The skin in that area did not burn and there is no change in the skin color in the treatment area. I also use this product as a leave-in hair conditioner and styling gel. It has been a lifesaver during the past 18 months while growing my hair back in, and my hair is very soft. I also mix a few drops of peppermint essential oil with this gel in a roller bottle and apply it to itchy bug bites. It soothes the itch! Great product! Many, many uses!
customer_reviews.author: Linda O.

customer_reviews.title: the skin on her exposed arms and legs was rather reptilian like with deep cracks and blistering
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my 94 yr young mother that has been a avid gardener all her life--w/out sunscreen... Needless to say, the skin on her exposed arms and legs was rather reptilian like with deep cracks and blistering...But after only 2 weeks of applying the Aloe Vera Gel there has been remarkable improvement to her skin..AND she is no longer picking at the dry skin...Thank you for such a great product..
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great for sunburn
customer_reviews.text: One of my children has extremely sensitive skin and gets red at the end of the day even with sunscreen. After shower at night I apply this and he wakes up without redness. I also use it as a serum at night time before applying my regular night cream. I feel it helps with healing whatever damages my skin endured during the day. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: SFshop

product_meta.title: Aloe Vera Gel from Organic Cold Pressed Aloe for Face, Body, and Hair, 8 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Often referred to as nature’s miracle plant, Aloe Vera has been used for thousands of years to hydrate skin. Aloe Vera has a wide variety of uses:

- Moisturizes dry skin.

- Use as hair styling gel or leave in conditioner for healthier and shinier looking hair.

- Use as a moisturizer on its own or mix with essential oils to make your own custom formula.

- Use as aftershave or post waxing treatment.

- Great for your pets too! Use on dry patches for dogs and cats.

Our Aloe Vera isn’t loaded with chemicals, and you can feel the difference! Contains no added color, fragrance, or alcohol. It’s as close as it gets to breaking open the actual Aloe leaf straight from the plant!

The thinner consistency goes on smoothly, spreads easily, and absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling silky and smooth.

Contains 99.75% pure, cold-pressed Aloe Vera. The remaining 0.25% are food grade preservatives required to keep the product safe.

Manufacturer’s 100% Hassle-Free Guarantee: If you’re not happy for any reason, simply contact us and we’ll give you a full refund, no questions asked and no need to return the bottle.

Order Your Bottle Of Aloe Vera Gel Now to Enjoy the Benefits of Nature’s Miracle Plant!
